title: Terminal buffer cleared when moving agents between tabs
description:
Bug: When moving agents between tabs, the terminal buffer gets wiped/cleared. The Claude instance is still running but the previous terminal output is lost and not redrawn.

Expected: Terminal should preserve and redraw all previous output when an agent is moved to a different tab.

Related commit 5ba3d8b attempted to fix this by adding terminal.refresh() after fit():
```tsx
// Force a full redraw of the terminal canvas
xtermRef.current.refresh(0, rows - 1)
```

The refresh() call redraws the canvas but doesn't restore the buffer contents. The issue is likely that the terminal buffer itself is being cleared somewhere during the tab move operation, or the terminal instance is being recreated.

Files to investigate:
- src/renderer/components/Terminal.tsx - the refresh logic around line 125
- Look at how terminal instances are managed when agents move between tabs
- Check if terminals are being unmounted/remounted during tab changes

Original issue this was supposed to fix: bismarck-q82
